directions.text: Toast the lentils over low heat for 8½ mins, stirring continuously.
Add sesame seeds, curry leaves, and chilies.
Stir in the tamarind and asafetida and toast for 1 min longer.
Turn off heat, and add sugar, stir till melted.
Scrape pot into lentils an let cool.
Grind into a coarse powder, spread on a tray and let dry for 1 hour.
